DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect Tantum Verde® improve recovery follow tonsillectomy Study design : A prospective double-blined randomize trial . Sample size : Thirty patient undergo tonsillectomy treat Tantum Verde® Mouth wash solution , control group 30 patient undergo tonsillectomy treated placebo . The study conduct Departments Otolaryngology - Head Neck Surgery Western Galilee Medical Center , Nahariya , Israel . Patients scheduled tonsillectomy without adenoidectomy recruit study . They sign inform consent one two place : department surgery clinic visit surgery . The patient evaluate ability gargle spit water surgery , assign either treatment group get solution Tantum Verde control group receive saline mint flavor , identicle bottle . Randomization do use random number generator program . The patient ask gargle spit solution receive three time day 30 second , follow week surgery .
